body_html:
Ok what happened here is that ArgMax never had a gradient, but really should have a gradient of None registered (telling TF that it's not differentiable).

Previously, the cast would swallow that error though, since it isn't differentiable, therefore TF never even looked for the inner (argmax) gradient.

This should have been fixed in 18bab99.
body_text:
Ok what happened here is that ArgMax never had a gradient, but really should have a gradient of None registered (telling TF that it's not differentiable).
Previously, the cast would swallow that error though, since it isn't differentiable, therefore TF never even looked for the inner (argmax) gradient.
This should have been fixed in 18bab99.
body:
Ok what happened here is that ArgMax never had a gradient, but really should have a gradient of `None` registered (telling TF that it's not differentiable). 

Previously, the cast would swallow that error though, since it isn't differentiable, therefore TF never even looked for the inner (argmax) gradient. 

This should have been fixed in 18bab99ac33f31192d400aebcfb7670a121655bd.
